DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the effects of leucine and branched-chain amino acids supplementation on skeletal muscle remodeling signaling pathways induced by resistance exercise.
DOC.brief_title: Branched-chain Amino Acids, and Resistance Exercise on Skeletal Muscle Signaling Pathways
DOC.criteria: Sedentaries Must be able to exercise Must be able to swallow tablets Use of nutritional supplements Use of antiinflammatory drugs
